c74object.name: gyro.rotator~
c74object.description: Rotate a soundfield. Use argument to select ambisonic order. Ambisonic order is 1 by default.

attribute.name: euler
attribute.digest: Euler angles (order) to be used for world rotation
attribute.description: Euler angles (order) to be used for world rotation

attribute.name: quaternion
attribute.digest: Quaternion (xyzw) to be used for world rotation
attribute.description: Quaternion (xyzw) to be used for world rotation

attribute.name: rotate order
attribute.digest: Set the order in which rotations are applied
attribute.description: Set the order in which rotations are applied.
